extendedInfo.description: Mobile network packet sniffer for ROOT ARM droids ("su" utility should be installed). This is a free demo version, which will help you to test the packet capture engine on your device.WARNING! You should not use the application for illegal activities, use it only for educational or engineering purposes.P.S. Recommended network applications:- Fing- ezNetScan- Servers Ultimate- dSploit (not market)- Intercepter-NG

reviews.title: GUI improvement needed
reviews.comment: Please  add one more column on main window. I woulld like to have something like this on my Nexus 7:  a) Portrait Mode 1. Proto 2. Source(MAC) 3. Destination(MAC) 4. Information  b) Landscape Mode 1. Net 2. Time 3. Program 4. Proto 5. Source(MAC) 6. Destination(MAC) 7. Length 8. Information
